show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

title: Active Hope
content: A talk with Joanna Macy about her new book, Active Hope: How to Face the Mess We’re In Without Going Crazy, coauthored... <!--more--> with Chris Johnstone; her  technique called “The Work that Reconnects”: a wider sense of self, a different kind of power, a more interrelated sense of community; poem by Rilke, translated by Joanna Macy (with Anita Barrows)
